org.bouncycastle.asn1.x500

Class X500NameBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bouncycastle.asn1.x500.X500NameBuilder

  • public class X500NameBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    A builder class for making X.500 Name objects.
